entries.name: Watcher’s Crown
entries.description: Jagged ridge of dragonbone peaks. Once an observatory of the old starseers.

entries.name: Fogreach
entries.description: Flooded lowlands where memory drifts like mist. Salt ruins rise and vanish with the tide.

entries.name: Sunken Chapel
entries.description: Only the steeple remains above the reedwater. Hymns still echo when moonlight strikes it.
